name: Cellular Revive Serum
description: Clinical-grade vitamin C + hyaluronic acid serum for brightening & hydration. Advanced formulation with 15% L-Ascorbic Acid and triple molecular weight hyaluronic acid for maximum penetration and results.
shortDescription: Clinical-grade vitamin C + hyaluronic acid serum for brightening & hydration.

name: Hydrating Facial Cream
description: Rich moisturizing cream with ceramides and peptides for all skin types. Contains 5 essential ceramides, niacinamide, and collagen-boosting peptides for barrier repair and anti-aging.
shortDescription: Rich moisturizing cream with ceramides and peptides for all skin types.

name: Vitamin C Brightening Serum
description: Stable vitamin C formula to even skin tone and boost radiance. 20% ethyl ascorbic acid with ferulic acid and vitamin E for enhanced stability and brightening power.
shortDescription: Stable vitamin C formula to even skin tone and boost radiance.

name: Anti-Aging Eye Cream
description: Peptide-rich eye cream to reduce puffiness & fine lines. Advanced formula with 5 peptide complex, caffeine, and hyaluronic acid for comprehensive eye area care.
shortDescription: Peptide-rich eye cream to reduce puffiness & fine lines.

name: SPF Moisturizer
description: Daily SPF 50 moisturizer with antioxidants for everyday protection. Lightweight formula with broad-spectrum UVA/UVB protection, niacinamide, and green tea extract.
shortDescription: Daily SPF 50 moisturizer with antioxidants for everyday protection.

name: Nourishing Facial Oil
description: Botanical blend of rosehip, jojoba, and argan oils for deep nourishment. Rich in omega fatty acids and vitamins for radiant, supple skin.
shortDescription: Botanical blend of rosehip, jojoba, and argan oils for deep nourishment.

name: Retinol Night Treatment
description: Clinical 0.5% retinol serum for anti-aging and skin renewal. Time-released formula minimizes irritation while maximizing results.
shortDescription: Clinical 0.5% retinol serum for anti-aging and skin renewal.

name: AHA/BHA Exfoliating Toner
description: Gentle chemical exfoliant with 10% AHA and 2% BHA for smooth, clear skin. Refines texture, minimizes pores, and brightens complexion.
shortDescription: Gentle chemical exfoliant with 10% AHA and 2% BHA for smooth, clear skin.

name: Hydrating Sheet Mask Pack
description: Set of 5 intensive hydration sheet masks with hyaluronic acid and ceramides. Deep moisture infusion for instantly plump, glowing skin.
shortDescription: Set of 5 intensive hydration sheet masks with hyaluronic acid and ceramides.
